name: Sour Bubble
description: Sour Bubble is an indica bred by B.O.G. Seeds parented solely by BOG Bubble. Sour Bubble is backcrossed 3 times with Bog Bubble. These sticky buds offer a sweet, fruity aroma with diesel undertones, and deliver relaxing, uplifting effects. Sour Bubble is useful for treating pain, insomnia, muscle spasms, anxiety, and nausea.
